name: ClientPlayerEntityHelper
description: The `ClientPlayerEntityHelper` class is a specialized wrapper for the client-side player entity in JSMacros, providing access to player-specific functionality, movement controls, interaction methods, and client-side operations.
overview: This class extends `PlayerEntityHelper` and inherits all player and living entity methods while adding client-specific functionality like camera control, movement manipulation, and client-side interactions. This class is typically obtained through the `Player.getPlayer()` method and represents the local client player. It provides comprehensive methods for controlling player movement, camera direction, item cooldowns, food management, and various client-side player operations that are specific to the local player experience.

methods.name: getPlayerName
methods.description: Gets the player's actual name (not display name).

methods.name: getAbilities
methods.description: Gets the player's abilities object, providing access to properties like gamemode, flying status, etc.

methods.name: getXP
methods.description: Gets the player's total experience points.

methods.name: getXPLevel
methods.description: Gets the player's current experience level.

methods.name: getXPProgress
methods.description: Gets the player's progress towards the next experience level (0.0 to 1.0).

methods.name: getXPToLevelUp
methods.description: Gets the experience points needed for the player to reach the next level.

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description: Gets the player's current health.

methods.name: getMaxHealth
methods.description: Gets the player's maximum health.

methods.name: getMainHand
methods.description: Gets the item stack held in the player's main hand.

methods.name: getOffHand
methods.description: Gets the item stack held in the player's off hand.

methods.name: isSleepingLongEnough
methods.description: Checks if the player has been sleeping long enough to skip the night.

methods.name: getFishingBobber
methods.description: Gets the fishing bobber entity if the player is currently fishing.

methods.name: getAttackCooldownProgress
methods.description: Gets the player's attack cooldown progress (0.0 to 1.0, where 1.0 means ready to attack).

methods.name: getScore
methods.description: Gets the player's current score.

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Gets a list of all active status effects on the player.

methods.name: hasStatusEffect
methods.description: Checks if the player has a specific status effect identified by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the status effect to check for.

methods.name: isHolding
methods.description: Checks if the player is holding a specific item in either hand.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item ID (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond_pickaxe') or ItemStackHelper to check for.

methods.name: getAbsorptionHealth
methods.description: Gets the player's current absorption health.

methods.name: getArmor
methods.description: Gets the player's total armor protection value.

methods.name: lookAt
methods.signature: lookAt(x: number, y: number, z: number)
methods.description: Orients the player's camera to look towards a specific 3D target position.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X coordinate of the target.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y coordinate of the target.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: The Z coordinate of the target.

methods.name: getPos
methods.description: Gets the player's current 3D position as a `Pos3D` object.

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the Euclidean distance between the player and another `EntityHelper`.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to measure the distance to.

methods.name: setPos
methods.signature: setPos(x: number, y: number, z: number, onGround: boolean)
methods.description: Sets the player's position to the specified coordinates. This method is asynchronous and returns a Promise.

parameters.name: onGround
parameters.description: Whether the player should be considered on the ground after setting position.

methods.name: getAttackCooldownProgressPerTick
methods.description: Gets the fraction of attack cooldown progress that is gained each game tick.

methods.name: getItemCooldownsRemainingTicks
methods.description: Returns a map of items (by their string ID) and the number of ticks remaining on their cooldown.

methods.name: calculateMiningSpeed
methods.description: Calculates the number of game ticks required for the player to mine a specific `blockState` using the provided `toolStack`.

parameters.name: toolStack
parameters.description: The item stack representing the tool being used for mining.

parameters.name: blockState
parameters.description: The block state of the block to calculate mining speed against.

methods.name: getFoodLevel
methods.description: Gets the player's current food (hunger) level (0-20).

methods.name: getSaturation
methods.description: Gets the player's current food saturation level.

methods.name: getEyeHeight
methods.description: Gets the player's eye height relative to their position.
